features: GOURMIA is the #1 BESTSELLING Airfryer Brand in the USA in 2022! Gourmia delivers value and quality you can trust for your home essentials
body.description: One appliance. Endless possibilities. Treat yourself to healthy and delicious meals with the Gourmia Digital French Door Air Fryer Toaster Oven. Fry Force 360° Technology cooks food quickly and evenly with little to no oil. 17 One-Touch Cooking Functions allow you to air fry, bake, dehydrate, and more - with just a tap. Use easy-set digital controls to adjust time, temperature, and toast settings. The oven fits a 12’’ pizza or 6 slices of bread. A large viewing window, compact design, and French doors set this Air Fryer Toaster Oven apart. Includes dishwasher safe air fry basket, oven rack, baking pan, and crumb tray. FryForce 360° Technology Precision engineered, patented air flow duct system creates a powerful cyclonic heat flow while blowing air directly over heating elements and onto food, resulting in the perfect crispy fry - with little to no oil Powerful Air Circulation Targets food with fast, super-heated air from every direction Perfect Crisp Gives food a golden, crispy exterior and moist interior Healthy Eating Enjoy all of your favorite foods with little to no oil Express Heat System Cooks food up to 30% faster than most ovens 17 One-Touch Cooking Functions: Air Fry, Toast, Bagel, Bake, Roast, Broil, Pizza, Convection Bake, Dehydrate, Reheat, Keep Warm, Fries, Wings, Bacon, Snacks, Vegetables, Seafood

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome & the perfect sized toaster over air fryer for our home!
reviews.reviewText: Wasn't sure I really needed one of these, but after being convinced by a friend with this same brand/style but larger size unit, decided to give it a try. While it may look smaller than an oven, it definitely holds a lot inside, and I have yet to ever fill my actual oven, so this makes a lot more sense. Heats up quickly and does exactly what it says it'll do on multiple settings... I am very impressed - and I'm not even a fan of cooking anything... this totally eliminates the oven for 99% of anything I would usually bake in an oven, and it's so much easier to use, quicker and no hot spots in weird places, like I have in the back of my oven. This replaces a much older basic toaster oven that did it's job for what it could do, but now I have so many other options to work with, I've even started making new things I would have never tried before... Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great and looks great. Not huge which is good but can hold a whole chicken and 6 slices of bread. Very quiet and evenly cooks. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid Air Fryer-Toaster Oven Combo for a good Price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace a toaster oven that gave up the ghost. Good Size, easy to use controls, which are more intuitive than most. It's my 5th air fryer, and none seem to air fry as good as the one you could buy in the 90s, but it works (occasionally you might add 3-4 minutes for more crispness.One, and only one complaint. They give you 4 accessories (Crumb Tray, Rack, Basket, Baking Tray). The Tray is the issue. Works fine but the stuff you put on it stains from first use (I made a roll of cinnamon rolls from a tube). It doesn't look non-stick, it's doesn't say it's non stick, it gives no special handling instructions, but after one use, it looks like the Tray is 15 years old. Don't let this stop you, but If I had to do it again, I'd cook anything on a layer of aluminum foil

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working well so far, more updates if warranted
reviews.reviewText: I had my doubts but so far it's working great, I've been using an broiler/oven for a long time and it has been so complicated, The Gourmia air fryer is so much more efficient and easy to use. I'll be updating this if there are any issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large capacity, ease of use, many cooking and frying options
reviews.reviewText: I love the capacity while it doesn’t take a lot of space on my counter.I can use it for even larger casseroles. No need to use the big oven.The doors open simultaneously, makes great toast compared to any toaster or toaster oven I’ve had.Surprisingly low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy with this!
reviews.reviewText: To my surprise, it is smaller than I thought it was, and I can fit it in the place where my old toaster oven went. I didn't realize just how much I needed the constant circulating air to evenly cook my food. I can't wait to try all the features this has, but primarily I bought this to heat up my cook unity meals. I had basically beef stew for lunch and it was almost perfect. Quite the change from the burned or freezing cold meals I've been eating lately with that inherited toaster oven. I just need to figure out how to adjust the time to the ideal for my meals but I'm confident I can. Also really excited about having pizza again! There is a very small gap between the two doors, but I'm not terribly concerned about that. I checked several times while it was cooking seeing how hot that area was and it wasn't that hot at all. It was about the same temperature as the glass

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Fryer, Toaster Oven
reviews.reviewText: The Gourmia Toaster Oven Air Fryer is very stylish and easy to use. This is our first attempt at Air Frying and it is super easy. Excellent product, it arrived on time and was well packed. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the Dutch doors...no more burned arms from drop down door. LOVE the convection baking option. Haven't used it for toast yet but make bacon in it all the time. Also, after seeing mine in action, three of my friends ordered one for themselves. So much more than a toaster oven. Best, most versatile little oven on the planet.
La caja llegó rota, pero el producto venía sin un rasguño, funciona a la perfección, el estilo de puertas es muy funcional y tiene muy buen tamaño

I liked the compact nature of this 20L Air fryer, and it was well made, but after using it a few times, i just felt it struggled to do it's job, if you used the drip tray it killed the circulation, so you would have to turn the items constantly to get them to cook evenly, i think the biggest design flaw with this unit is that they use a small fan, likely a 120mm fan, that shoots air from the side, which means that it won't circulate air nearly as well as a top firing fan, the fan is also not very powerful, it's actually very quiet, which is nice, but if it's not moving enough air, then what's the point, the faster the air moves in an air fryer the better. This unit is more like a XL toaster oven with a convection feature, the fan needs to move MUCH, MUCH more air than that to be classified as an air fryer. This was not the experience i was looking for.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llevo poco udsndolo hasta ahora bien
reviews.reviewText: No frie sin aceite seria milagroso, pero en comparacion a un horno electrico convencional dora mejor
